tool_description: Identifies and categorizes relevant stakeholders for nonprofit program planning, including their roles and engagement strategies.

program_focus.description: Main focus area of the program (e.g., education, healthcare, environment)

geographic_scope.description: Geographic area the program will serve (local, regional, national)

organization_type.description: Type of nonprofit organization (service, advocacy, educational, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid geographic scope: Use one of [local, regional, national, international].
Empty program focus: Provide a specific program focus area.
Unrecognized organization type: Specify a clear nonprofit organization type.
usage: Specify the program focus, geographic scope, and organization type. The tool identifies key stakeholder categories and suggests engagement approaches for each group.

primary_stakeholders.description: Key stakeholders directly involved in program success

secondary_stakeholders.description: Stakeholders who may be affected by or influence the program

engagement_strategies.description: Recommended approaches for engaging each stakeholder group
